short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension That allows you to unlock social media profile pictures, downloading stories and a lot more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SocialStalker is a Tool that enhance your journey in social media platforms 

- Currently Supported: [Facebook.com | Instagram.com]

Features:

- Unlock Profile Picture of Facebook account
- View Full Size of Instagram Profile Picture
- Download Facebook and Instagram Stories / Highlights  (Photo, Video, Photo As Video, Archive)
- Download Instagram Photos and Videos
- Download Instagram Posts (All at Once)
- Download Facebook Uploaded Photos from any profile

NOTE: Your account need to be in English-US language to work probleby
